name: Save The Knight!
description:
Save The Knight! will take you through an atypical rescue mission: this time its the princess who must save her knight. She will do whatever it takes to rescue the knight from an evil dragon who has taken over an enchanted tower, the former royal family´s tower.

Save The Knight! is a 3D platformer game developed by advanced students at Universidad ORT Uruguay. Our team consists on both software engineering students and videogame art design students.

Comments are welcome! We would also like you to take part in the following survey that will allow us to make the game even better!

https://forms.gle/25PUMqnzWQ7jHYCN7
